# saviynt_job_control_resource (Resource)

Create and manage job control operations in Saviynt. Execute multiple jobs with version-based triggering and status tracking.

## Example Usage

```terraform
// Copyright (c) 2025 Saviynt Inc.
// SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

resource "saviynt_job_control_resource" "example" {
  run_jobs = [
    {
      job_name        = "WSRetryJob"
      trigger_name    = "ws_retry_trigger_example"
      job_group       = "Utility"
      run_job_version = "v1.0"
    },
    {
      job_name        = "UserImportJob"
      trigger_name    = "user_import_trigger"
      job_group       = "Import"
      run_job_version = "v1.0"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `run_jobs` (Attributes Set) List of job objects to run (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--run_jobs))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Job control resource identifier
- `run_messages` (Map of String) Map of trigger names to run operation response messages

<a id="nestedatt--run_jobs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `run_jobs`

Required:

- `job_group` (String) Job group for the job
- `job_name` (String) Name of the job to run
- `trigger_name` (String) Trigger name for the job

Optional:

- `run_job_version` (String) Version identifier to trigger job run. Change this value to trigger re-run of the job
